landing.title: Your emotional wellbeing is our priority
landing.cardDescription: A safe space where you can express yourself freely, discover resources to take care of your mental health and get guidance when you need it.
landing.description: Mental Link accompanies you in your emotional wellbeing, helping you recognise how you feel and find balance in your day-to-day.

about.title: About us
about.shortDescription: Mental Link is a project to accompany people in caring for their mental health.

project.p1: Mental Link is a technological initiative aimed to accompany people in caring for their mental health.
project.p2: Our goal is to create an accessible and friendly digital tool that helps identify emotions, log moods, and build a communication bridge with people who can provide support.
project.p3: Through an app, we want to offer a safe space where anyone can express themselves, find help resources and feel accompanied. We believe technology can drive positive social change.

team.p1: We are a team of young people from Trelew, Chubut, students at E.S.E.T.P N.¬∫ 724 'Presidente Dr. Humberto Illia'.
team.p2: We are driven by the motivation to provide solutions to real problems that affect people of all ages.
team.p3: With Mental Link we combine our skills in computing, creativity and social commitment to build a project that reaches beyond our school and supports diverse communities.

problem.p1: Today, thousands of people live with stress, anxiety, low motivation and difficulty expressing what they feel or asking for help.
problem.p2: At the same time, mental health resources are often insufficient or hard to access, creating a gap between need and available support.
problem.p3: Mental Link was born as a response to this need: a platform designed to accompany, connect and give voice to those seeking emotional support in their daily lives.

values.headline: A digital companion tool for young people and adults
values.tagline: Connect with your emotions, grow with confidence.

account.title: Account management
account.deleteChatDesc: This will permanently remove all conversations with Luna. This cannot be undone.
account.deleteAccountDesc: This will permanently delete your account, daily summaries and all stored information. This cannot be undone.
account.logoutDescTrue: Your account and data will remain safe. You can sign in again whenever you want.
account.logoutDescFalse: You will return to the home screen. Your temporary data will be lost.

settings.goodbyeBody: We hope to see you again soon. Take care.

privacy.protectedBody: All information you share is confidential and handled with the highest security standards.

1.title: Welcome to Mental Link! üåô
1.description: Your personal companion to care for mental health and emotional wellbeing
1.content: Mental Link helps you log your emotions, receive support and connect with trusted people when you need it.

2.title: Home & Moods üòä
2.description: Express how you feel each day
2.content: Select emojis or write freely about your emotions. You will receive personalized supportive messages based on your state.

3.title: Luna - Your Support Chatbot üåô
3.content: Luna is always available to listen, offer relaxation techniques and guide you when you need emotional support.

4.title: Dashboard & Calendar üìä
4.content: See patterns in your emotions with interactive charts and keep a daily log in your personal calendar.

5.title: Wellness Exercises üíÜ
5.content: Access breathing exercises, meditation and relaxation techniques to manage anxiety, stress and improve wellbeing.

6.title: Support Network üë•
6.content: Register trusted contacts to receive support when you need it. Your safety is our priority.

quickMood.title: How are you feeling today?
quickMood.instructions: If no emoji represents you, write freely how you feel
quickMood.placeholder: E.g.: I'm stressed about my math homework...
quickMood.techniquesTitle: üí° Techniques that can help you now:
quickMood.chatInvite: Talk with Luna for personalised support
quickMood.rememberBody: If you need immediate help, contact your trusted adult or the emergency line.

examples.example1: I'm stressed about my math homework
examples.example4: I'm happy because I passed the test
examples.example5: I have family problems at home
examples.example6: I feel anxious for no clear reason

quickMood.tipBody: Be specific about your situation. The more details, the better I can help.

registration.redirect: your account has been created. Redirecting to the app...
registration.intro: To give you the best personalized experience we need some basic information
registration.privacyRest: This information is used only to personalize your experience and ensure your safety. The emergency contact will only be used in situations that require intervention.

errors.minAge: You must be at least 12 years old to use Mental Link
errors.phoneDigits: Phone must have at least 10 digits

alert.betaBody: Notifications to trusted adults are simulated. This app complements but does not replace professional help.

happy.label: Happy
happy.message: It's great that you're feeling happy! Enjoy this moment and remember you deserve to feel this way. Your positive energy can brighten the people around you.
happy.supportMessage: If you want to share your joy or talk about what makes you feel good, Luna is here to listen.

sad.label: Sad
sad.message: It's normal to feel sad sometimes. Your emotions are valid and it's okay to take the time you need. Sadness also passes and you're not alone.
sad.supportMessage: If you need to vent or just someone to listen, Luna is available to support you.

anxious.label: Anxious
anxious.message: Anxiety can be overwhelming, but you're stronger than you think. Breathe deeply and remember difficult moments are temporary. You will get through this.
anxious.supportMessage: Luna can guide you through relaxation techniques and strategies to manage anxiety. Don't hesitate to talk to her.

angry.label: Angry
angry.message: Feeling angry is completely normal. The important thing is to recognize it and find healthy ways to express it. You'll find calm again.
angry.supportMessage: Talking about what's bothering you can help process these feelings. Luna is here to listen without judgment.

calm.label: Calm
calm.message: I'm glad you're feeling at peace. This calmness is a gift you give yourself. Take advantage of this moment of well-being.
calm.supportMessage: If you want to maintain this sense of calm or learn relaxation techniques, Luna can guide you.

moodSelector.title: How are you feeling today?
moodSelector.subtitle: Tap the emoji that best represents your mood

emotionalDashboard.title: Your emotional state
emotionalDashboard.subtitle: This is how your week has been

motivationalMessages.0: Each day is a new opportunity to feel better.
motivationalMessages.1: Remember it's okay not to be okay sometimes.
motivationalMessages.3: Your feelings are valid and normal.

stats.difficult: Remember that difficult days also pass

keywords.professionalHelp3: I want to talk to someone

chatbot.title: Luna
chatbot.subtitle: Your emotional support companion ‚Ä¢ Always here to listen
chatbot.clearChatConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all chat history with Luna?
chatbot.tapOptionToStart: Tap an option to start chatting
chatbot.welcomeWithName: Hello {name}! üåô I'm Luna, your emotional support companion. I'm glad to see you again. How are you feeling today?
chatbot.welcomeWithoutName: Hello! üåô I'm Luna, your emotional support companion. I'm here to listen and help you. How are you feeling today?

initial.text: Do you want small steps or set a goal?

responses.goal: Perfect. What would be an achievable goal in 1 week?

initial.text: Make a plan or focus techniques?

responses.plan: Ok ‚Äî set a 25-minute block and focus on one topic.
responses.focus: Try the Pomodoro technique: 25m study / 5m break. Want me to make a quick plan?

initial.text: If you want to vent, I'm here to listen without judgment. Do you want to start by telling me briefly what happened or would you prefer calming techniques first?

responses.tell: I'm listening. Tell me in your words what happened.
responses.calm: Brief technique: 5 deep breaths (inhale 4s, hold 2s, exhale 6s). Want me to guide you?

emotionalCalendar.title: Emotional calendar
emotionalCalendar.description: Visualize your emotional progress day by day and discover patterns in your wellbeing.

empty.title: You don't have any records yet
empty.description: Complete your first daily summary to start seeing your emotional progress in the calendar.

trustedAdult.title: Ask for help
trustedAdult.subtitle: Connect with a trusted adult
trustedAdult.emergencyLineLabel: If it's an emergency, call immediately:
trustedAdult.whoToTalk: Who do you want to talk to?
trustedAdult.messagePlaceholder: Tell your trusted adult how you feel or what you need...

sent.title: Message sent
sent.subtitle: Your message was sent successfully
sent.contactSoon: will receive your message and contact you soon.

supportReminder.line1: Remember there is always someone willing to listen and help you.
supportReminder.line2: You are not alone in this.

privacy.title: Your privacy is important
privacy.body1: All messages are private and confidential.
privacy.body2: Only the person you choose will receive your message.

teamContact.title: Contact our team
teamContact.subtitle: We are students committed to emotional wellbeing. We want to hear from you!

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.p1_pre: We are a group of students from the
whoWeAre.p2: Our project is born from our passion for technology and social commitment. We believe innovation can be a powerful tool to improve our community's mental health.
whoWeAre.p3: Mental Link is more than an app: it's our contribution to a world where everyone can express their emotions and find support when needed.

instagram.title: Official Instagram
instagram.description: Follow us for updates, wellbeing tips and to learn more about our project

email.title: Email
email.description: For inquiries, suggestions or if you want to collaborate with our project

commitment.title: Our commitment to you
commitment.intro: We know that talking about mental health requires trust and respect. Therefore, we commit to:

collab.title: Do you want to collaborate with Mental Link?
collab.p1: If you are a mental health professional, educator, or simply someone who wants to contribute to the project, we would love to meet you!

header.title: Daily summary
header.description: Take a few minutes to reflect on your day. This information will help you better understand your emotional patterns.
header.savedBody: Thanks for taking the time to reflect on your wellbeing. Your information has been recorded to help you track your progress.
